name: Boggard Sovereign
description: The Boggard Sovereign is a large humanoid with a commanding presence among other boggards. It exhibits amphibious traits and thrives in aquatic environments.
memorable: Its ability to summon frog allies and incite frenzy among boggards makes it a formidable foe in battles.
goals: Acts as a leader and tactician among boggards, aiming to control the battlefield and support allied creatures.
relations: Other boggards and amphibious creatures, particularly frogs and toads, as it can communicate with them.
strengths: Possesses strong physical attributes, good stealth, and skills in intimidation and perception.
weaknesses: Moderate speed on land may limit mobility outside water.
attacks: Parting Bite attack that deals both piercing and poison damage, with the ability to leap away after the strike.
most_powerful_ability: Incite Frenzy allows allies to make additional attacks, significantly escalating combat dynamics.
senses: Has a passive perception of 13, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in stealth, perception, and intimidation with modifiers of +3.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious nature.
Can summon frog guardians to aid in battle.
Can communicate with frogs and toads, enhancing its leadership role.
